content.raw:
- Mud before pr: http://i.imgur.com/qTrrJ0s.jpg

- Mud after pr: http://i.imgur.com/4ZvRBJi.jpg

That's about a magnitude worse than it was before reducing resolution. 

Regarding heightmap texture sizes: should be good (taking a look at it now), for task1 the fungus texture covering the top of the hills should be increased rather than decreased though as it gets very repetitive otherwise and you only see it from a large distance anyway (there's a ticket opened by someone complaining about too repetitive texture on the hills in the background of task1).
content.html:
• Mud before pr: http://i.imgur.com/qTrrJ0s.jpg

  • Mud after pr: http://i.imgur.com/4ZvRBJi.jpg

That's about a magnitude worse than it was before reducing resolution.

Regarding heightmap texture sizes: should be good (taking a look at it now), for task1 the fungus texture covering the top of the hills should be increased rather than decreased though as it gets very repetitive otherwise and you only see it from a large distance anyway (there's a ticket opened by someone complaining about too repetitive texture on the hills in the background of task1).
